PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Ansco Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Mr. Zack Winston, 2451 Waring Court, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg.5 with question: "Do you think that the city needs a fair housing ordinance?" answer reads: "I think that the city should have a law. One of the reasons is that it will show that if you can afford to live and will maintain your property and keep it as well as anybody else, you can live in whatever area you want to.  Why shouldn't you?"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Zack Winston, wearing straw hat with plaid band, circle patterned necktie, and striped jacket, standing against light colored pillar with buildings on left, and double glass doors on right
